addController(address).details: Add an address allowed to control this contract

balanceOf(address).details: get the balance of this fee manager. Pass a zero address in for FTM balance

fee(uint256).details: Get the fee divisor for the specified token

isController(address).details: Check if this address is a controller

relinquishControl().details: Remove the sender address from the list of controllers

setFee(uint256,uint256).details: Set the fee divisor for the specified token

transferEth(address,uint256).details: transfer ETH from this contract to the to given recipient

transferToken(address,address,uint256).details: transfer tokens from this contract to the to given recipient
